attributes.action: Review University Management expenses claims and enforce regulation
attributes.additional_details:
Link to The Guardian's review of the Channel 4 Dispatches broadcast:

https://www.theguardian.com/media/2018/feb/24/vice-chancellors-expenses-scandal-channel-4-dispatches-universities
attributes.background: Following the recent Channel 4 Dispatches investigation exposing the lavish spending by university chiefs at a time when lecturers are striking over pensions; a review of management expenses should be undertaken and measures put in place to ensure that public taxpayers’ money is well regulated.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
